Japanese: フィン・ディー＿司会（真剣）

English: We've reached the finals at last.
Ladies and gentlemen!

Japanese:
私たちは今、
信じられない出来事を
目撃しようとしています。
English: We are currently bearing witness to an unprecedented event.

Japanese:
なんと、
ファイナリスト二人が
共に、歳若い少年なのです。
English: Our finalists this time are both young boys.

Japanese:
名のある人形使いを退け、
二人の少年が戦う。
English: These two boys are fighting to make their names as Puppeteers.

Japanese: わずか２回目のこの大会ですが、
English: Though this is only the second time this tournament has been held,

Japanese:
マリオネーションギアの歴史に
残るであろう、驚くべき出来事
がおこっているのです。
English: it's an astonishing event that will go down in the history of Marionation Gear.

Japanese:
かたや１４歳。
昨年度優勝者/c5リュー・ガウゼン/c3。
English: Over here, we have last year's champion: 14-year-old /c5Ryuu Gauzen/c3!
And the contender, at just 13 years old: /c5/p/c3!

Japanese:
皆様、この戦いの結果に
ご注目ください。
English: Everyone, please pay close attention to how this fight turns out.

Japanese:
それでは、
決勝戦を開始いたします。
English: With that, let the final battle commence!

Japanese: 子供子供ってうるさいぜ。
English: {Children} this and {children} that, she says. So annoying.

Japanese:
人形操りに、大人も子供も
関係ないんだよ。
English: Whether you're a child or an adult has nothing to do with your Puppeteering.

Japanese: 必要なのは年齢じゃない。
English: It's not about your age.
It's about the fire in your soul!
Who's THIS guy?
I'm Ryuu!
The Puppeteer, Ryuu!
Let's go, /p.

Japanese:
正々堂々、
燃えるようなバトルを
やらかそうぜ！！
English:
Let's get fired up for a fair-and-
square battle!

Japanese:
オレの人形は、
輪工房の最新作だ。
English: My Puppet's the latest model from the Wheel Workshop.

Japanese: 人よんで/c5斧人形ギール/c3。
English: They named it the /c5Axe Puppet Gill/c3.

Japanese: 巨大な斧で敵を粉砕する。
English: All my opposition gets pulverized beneath this enormous axe.
Here we come!
